messages.subject: Re : Our Fears
messages.msgSnippet: ... My 3.5 year old was attacked by a pit bull on Monday night. -=-=-=-=-=- I m sooo sorry! I hope she heals fast---physically and emotionally! My
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----

My 3.5 year old was attacked by a pit bull on Monday night.

-=-=-=-=-=-

I'm sooo sorry! I hope she heals fast---physically and emotionally!

My sister-in-law, the pediatric oncology nurse, recommended this to me
when I asked about Hannah Jenner's meds being so awful:

Get Skittles and warm them in your hands. When they are soft enough to
flatten, then put the meds inside and wrap the flattened Skittle around
it. *Don't* do this surreptitiously! Let her know what you're doing so
that she doesn't bite down on it accidentally. But that way she can eat
a few, swallow one whole, and then chew a few more.

Good luck!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
